I’m trying to *avoid making users refresh the page editor* on blog posts in this case :point_down::skin-tone-2:
1. a user sets a featured image in a post’s `settings > featured image`
2. the user goes back to `content` tab
3. the module with `content.featured_image` is blank
4. when the user refreshes the page the module with `content.featured_image` is now showing
Anyone found a solution
Hi, My client want me to help him with *converting the Global module to Local module*, is there any way we can do it in design manager?
Nope. Has to be done through the CLI.
FYI if I remember correctly, it will reset any content you have in the front end back to the default.
There seems to be a bug in the default comments module. If users click to reply to a comment, the original comment form disappears and there’s no way to cancel the “reply to” comment form
